Portal 2 is one of the best games ever made. It's story is very good and funny and there are many interesting riddles. There is also a coop-mode which is really enjoyable. I definetely recommend the game to everyone.

很有意思的作品，到了第6章后我死了好多脑细胞啊啊啊啊啊。V社的良心之作，玩法比1代多了很多，画质上也有提升。剧情上也很丰富，阴沉的氛围让我联想到了地狱边境和inside。好游戏 推荐喜+1。

One of THE BEST games I've ever played, and I usually don't enjoy puzzle games. The mechanics, story, and voice acting are all top notch; this is somehow an improvement on Portal, one of the best games ever created. It doesn't feel dated despite being from 2011, and is a blast to play.

Arkadaşınızla eğlenebileceğiniz. Son derece eğlenceli aynı zamanda solo story modu olan mükemmel oyun .

- Oyun benim külüstür bilgisayarımda bile nadiren 30fps altına düşüyor.Map küçük olduğu için eski bilgisayarlarda rahatlıkla oynanabiliyor.

- Bazı bölümler beyin amcıklaması yaşatıyor bazıları ise kolay bir şekilde yapılabiliyor.

- Coop modunu daha oynamadım o kadar zeki olan arkadaşlarım oyun oynamak yerine çalışıyor :'(. [b]şaka[/b]
  
- Kısacası : [b]Hazır indirimdeyken alın[/b] kaçırmayın.

Best 2 bucks I have ever spent on a steam summer sale, this game has it all, puzzle, story, bitch ass GlaDos, rat man, and most importantly "Cave Johnson", with my favourite quote; "Plus, we fire the whole bullet, that's 65% more bullet, per bullet." as in the turrets. One of valves best games 10/10

Most entertaining and fun puzzle game I've ever played. I truly love GLaDOS, Wheatley and Chell. Together, they make such a good story. Sad but funny thanks to Wheatley (by being a hilarious idiot). The ending and the credit are the best scenes. It's a must have and I highly recommend it.
One of the best puzzle games ever made
Fun and awesome game with a great story and great puzzles.

To those wondering if this game is worth it. Yes. As a singleplayer game the storyline is extremely fun and sometimes challenging. The achievements is a fun to do list when the game is finished. And when you have a friend who owns the game, co-op is the way to go (recommended that you finish campaign first). Co-op really tests you and your friend's trust.
My friend repeatedly threw portals beneath my feet so that I can't exit a room. 10/10 would play again.
